title: Updated!  Granite Countertops!  Wood floors! Easy Highway Access!
posting_body: ['MENTION AD:702', 'Newly renovated 1 and 2 bedroom apartments are close to great schools, and beautiful parks.', 'Short drive to UT Arlington, AT&T Stadium, Globe Life Park, and DFW International Airport.', 'Step outside your door into the center of Arlington with effortless connection to major highways, giving you instant access to all the hottest social scenes, dining, and shopping.', '100% FREE SERVICE WITH A LICENSED AGENT!', '1 bedroom $850-920 /mo 485-650 sf', '2 bedroom $1,050-1,225 /mo', '803-950 sf', 'Pet Policy: Cats:Yes Dogs:Yes', 'Location: North Arlington', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed, 35 Pound Weight Limit, One time Fee $150.00, Rent $10.00', 'Comments: Cats and dogs welcome!', 'Community Amenities: Carports, Reserved Spaces, Outdoor Grills, Fitness center, Basketball and Sand Volleyball Courts, Perimeter fence, Bark Park, Playground, Three Sparkling Pools', 'Unit Amenities: Premium Countertops, Dishwashers, Storage closet outside, Microwaves, New Black Appliances, Ice makers, Miniblinds, Hi-speed internet, Hardwood Floors, Cable ready, Laundry Room Onsite, Private patios/balconies, Fireplaces, Intrusion Alarms', 'Desiree Galloway| Real Estate Agent | DASH Realty', 'show contact info', 'Please contact me directly to schedule an appointment.', 'Prices and specials change daily, contact me for availability.', 'All units do not have the advertised features or amenities.']
